title: Wicked Heir
description: Being a Whitlock in New Port Beach is like being born with a royal crown, money to burn, and an ID that reads “untouchable.”The Whitlock siblings own everything, rule everything, they are everything. But everyone knows money is the root of all evil, and nothing is ever as it seems.Welcome to Monarch Hills Academy, ruled by the Whitlock Dynasty. Author’s Note: Whitlock Dynasty is an Upper Young Adult/NA series of three complete standalone novels. Due to mature content this series is recommended for readers aged eighteen and over. It may contain triggers for some readers.
author: Bella J.
